Pre-Game Insights: Jos Buttler hopes England's T20 side will be battle-hardened from facing a strong Pakistan team for the World Cup after this series.
Seven of England's squad members featured in the Pakistan Super League (PSL) and shared positive experiences of being here and about how much the public loves the game.
England's squad includes players recovering from various injuries and those who will miss the series for different reasons.
England aims to honor Queen Elizabeth II by playing in a fashion that honors her memory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Security issues have meant Pakistan has struggled to attract visiting sides since an attack on the Sri Lankan team bus in 2009, but tours have slowly resumed in the past few years.
The first four matches will be in Karachi on September 20, 22, 23, and 25, and the next three in Lahore on September 28, 30, and October 2.
